comments: During a tough quarter, Professor Bernstein was a boon. What I thought was going to be an ordeal of a law class ended up being an amazing course that brought out the attorney in me I never knew existed. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for anyone interested in Law, Public Speaking, or a truly inspirational professor who prepares his students for the future.

comments: I\'m a rising senior, and this has been my favorite class so far. Professor is really funny, inspiring, and clear. The material is way more interesting and practical than most classes. The workload is easier than most, too. Strongly recommend.

comments: Reading is ESSENTIAL to passing. There are papers, a presentation, and exams. No discussion. The class isn\'t easy, but he curves it. It\'s really interesting and helpful if you wanna go to law school. Do not skip class. The professor is a nice guy and lectures well. Run your paper by the TA before you turn it in, VERY helpful.

comments: This class is the reason I\'m applying to law school. So good.

comments: Professor Bernstein\'s class was great! It was taught by him and two other lawyers for the most part. You have to buy a textbook straight from his TA\'s so that he can record participation (he grades blindly by reader #). There are 4 major things, an opening statement, a cross exam, one performance, and the final. He takes the higher of the first two

comments: Really great professor. Class is a ton of fun and interesting. MUST TAKE for polisci! Easy upper div! Work load not bad at all. (Just don\'t ask stupid questions you will be embarrassed)

comments: Great class, especially for students who are interested in going to law school or want to improve in their public speaking. He makes everyone feel very comfortable and answers questions very clearly. The material is interesting and lectures were always entertaining. Half the class is watching other people perform. Take this class!

comments: I\'m looking at classes to take this year and seriously bummed Bernstein isn\'t teaching a different class. I\'d probably sign up for any class he was teaching. He\'s funny but you learn a lot too. If you\'re interested in law school this class is a must.

comments: If you pay attention and know hot to write, this class is an easy A. The professor is funny. One TA was great; the others were useless.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Very little work involved in this class, but you better not be bad at performing publicly. Great to take if you are interested in going to law school, he would love to answer your questions. He\'s a great attorney and President of the American Mock Trial Association.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Class is actually entertaining. Very little reading. If you\'re good at arguing or debating, or if you\'re thinking about law school, this class is fit.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Bernstein is extremely passionate about teaching. He really knows his material and does a great job of making complicated concepts seem simple and fun. His lectures are also really funny, since he uses real-life examples and cracks a lot of jokes in class. He also has really helpful TA\'s. I\'d definitely take another class with him again.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This professor is a really good one. He lectures well and is pretty lenient in grading. The book he assigns is kind of expensive (95 bucks i believe) but you know for sure that you are going to get a good grade and have a fun time.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: The best professor I\'ve ever had at UCI! If all of my professors had been as good as Bernstein, my education would have been much more valuable. The class was very hands on and had real world applicability for anyone going to law school. Grading can be difficult which means going to the TAs during office hours is very important and helpful.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Took this class last fall and it was the best class I\'ve taken at UCI. Professor Bernstein is really chill, passionate about trial law, very intelligent, and best of all, extremely funny. It\'s pretty much an easy A if you do all the work and attend class. I laughed a lot and learned a ton. Strongly recommend this class.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Fun class if you like trial law and want to be a lawyer. 2 written assignments (take home), 1 presentation, 1 in class evidence quiz. Written assignments are easy, presentation is easy if you are good at presenting but evidence exam is what will determine if you get an A, A- or B+. Its not easy but not too hard either.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Amazing professor. I stumbled into his class just to check it out and I ended up staying for the rest of the quarter. Yes, it\'s a 3 hour class but bear in mind that half of it is watching in class performances (which everybody will do at least once). Great class, gave me real insight on trial law all while having fun.

tag_professor: Respected (6)  Amazing lectures (4)  Participation matters (3)  Hilarious (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Prof. Bernstein is great. His knowledge of trial advocacy is apparent every time he speaks. He is a great teacher to speak to and the TA\'s were really helpful. Also, he is a really good looking guy. Which definitely helps. I recommend taking this class for two reasons: 1) Your going to learn a lot! 2) You will definitely laugh a lot!
